item.title: American Express profits surge 16% in Q3, driven by wealthy card members
item.description: American Express reports a 16% increase in third-quarter profits, driven by higher card spending, especially among its wealthiest members

item.title: Ford recalls more than 290,000 vehicles in US due to issue with rear camera system
item.description: Ford is recalling more than 290,000 vehicles in the U.S. because the rearview camera system may not display images properly in certain lighting condit...

item.title: Meta adds parental controls for AI-teen interactions
item.description: Meta is adding parental controls to kids’ interactions with artificial intelligence chatbots — including the ability to turn off one-on-one chats with...

item.title: Egypt raises fuel prices for the second time this year
item.description: Egypt has increased fuel prices by around 12%, marking the second hike this year

item.title: World shares retreat after worries over bank lending pull Wall Street lower
item.description: World shares are lower following a retreat on Wall Street driven by concerns over banks' loan portfolios
